args.text: According to US News and World Report, some things to do in the top 10 travel destinations include exploring landmarks, trying local cuisine, visiting museums, hiking, biking, and enjoying outdoor activities such as surfing and zip lining. Specific recommendations include visiting the Eiffel Tower in Paris, relaxing on Matira Beach in Bora Bora, touring the Colosseum and Trevi Fountain in Rome, staying in an overwater bungalow in the Maldives, and hiking along the Rim and Bright Angel trails in the Grand Canyon National Park.
